ygData.msgSnippet: well said AOS, not everyone exploits, some ppl actually find a spot and stick to  it   i for one amd lvl 25 and have a grand total of 250pp to my name  lol  i
ygData.messageBody:
well said AOS, not everyone exploits, some ppl actually find a spot and
stick to it i for one amd lvl 25 and have a grand total of 250pp to my
name lol i am rich!! heh it sucks not having cions but i am working this
toon slowly and if i ever find a spot where there is a wy to make mega coin
i will stay there and get it i hate being broke but i deal with it


>From: AoS/Aosinator <darshan@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Dwarven Cleric
>Date: Wed, 20 Oct 1999 11:35:16 -0400
>
> >Very profitable way to hunt? Sounds like you're exploiting to me. I
> >don't know any 15th level anythings that can shell out the 1000+ pp
> >for an observer staff. That's a lot of greater lightstones and bronze
> >spears.
>
>Can be done and has been done in the past, without use of exploits.
>Aosinator had amassed almost 4000pp by the time she was level 15, and it
>was by using her proceeds in an intelligent manner. Don't point the
>accusatory finger at someone until ye know all the facts.
>
>-Aosinator Lightbringer
>-Devout follower of Marr on The Rathe
